review: The picture quality is so much better than it was when I used my laptop.
author: lil ol me

review: Received as a gift. Nice but needs more apps. Particularly looking for Coursera and EdX.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This turned my old 7 year old HDTV to a smart TV.  I not tech savvy and went on a You-Tude instructional video.  Did not even watch it for 2 minutes.  Once I got over my fear, set up was one easy as 1,2,3.  I am using Amazon Prime and Netflixs but there is still so much more.  Really enjoy watching movies on TV than on my I-Phone.  Would decently recommend to friends.  Wish I would have purchased soon.
author: Linda Alicea

review: Quite a lot of punch in such a small package. Immediateness after install was amazing. Unbelievable cache of goodies and movies. Granted, some are a little goofy and dispensable, in general very impressive
author: Niceshooz

review: Have been enjoying my Fire TV Stick since the day I received it.  What is there not to like about this device?
author: Anthony J. Ugliano, Sr.

review: Yes. It is easier than the Chromecast Dongle to set up, I was watching shows on th TV screen in 15 minutes.
author: KEITH H CHO
